original_title: Out of the Blue: A Film About Life and Football
overview: Out of the Blue is a documentary look at a group of high school athletes the blue chip programs didn't want who came to Boise State University, found a first year head coach with a blue-collar ethic and a no-nonsense attitude, and went on to compile a perfect 12-0 record. Their season culminated in a BCS busting 43-42 victory over perennial powerhouse Oklahoma in what many have called the greatest college football game ever played.
tagline: Feature documentary about Boise State football team.
title: Out of the Blue: A Film About Life and Football
